data.text: @EU_Commission Please listen to the electorate: Where are the voices calling for #ecigs to be banned? #EUecigBAN would be a disaster.
@EU_Commission Safety for all cigarette manufacturers you mean.
@EU_Commission You recognise by the use of #EUecigBAN  THAT is what you are attempting to achieve . ZERO logic in your proposals - Safety !!
@EU_Commission @KGeorgievaEU  And who will condemn the kidnappings of 12 nuns in Syria yesterday?
@EU_Commission Why are you trying to take our #ecigs away? We're not hurting anyone. You've misunderstood your role. Please reconsider.
@EU_Commission Work in progress SHOULD mean go away  carefully draft proportionate proposals . NOT something hastily cobbled together #ecigs
@EU_Commission So why ban anything above 0.5% nicotine (5mg/ml)?
.@EU_Commission  how much safer can you make a product that even skeptics agree is 99% safer than cigarettes? #euecigban #ecigs
@EU_Commission @Frederiqueries La commission utilise le #tag #euecigban ! C'est donc un aveu du bannissement de l'ecig ! #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission Dialogue with consumers,Scientific experts,Public Health experts?  NO , Proposals made up on the back of a fag packet - DIRE!
@EU_Commission: priority is to ensure safety for all #EUecigBAN.  #ecigs are SAFER THAN SMOKING. PERIOD. Common sense for all
@EU_Commission What detailed research ,impact assessment etc have been conducted into your LATEST (today) proposals-NONE  #EUecigBAN #ecigs
@EU_Commission are you willing to engage with us then?
@EU_Commission Safety has NEVER been a concern in the 6-7 years of #ecigs . This is blatant rubbish ,why dress this up as anything else !
@EU_Commission I guess u'll b looking at childproof packaging of cigarettes too? You r to apply rules to ecigs ABOVE those applying to cigs?
@EU_Commission @ECspokesScience  Good news
@EU_Commission You should be ashamed. Attempting to deny access under false pretences. This was never about safety. #euecigban <- Ban!
@EU_Commission you try to destroy a historical chance. #euecigban #ecigs
@EU_Commission ce nouvel accord de pêche entre le Maroc et EU est juste et équitable pour l'ensemble des parties #saharaoccidental #EU
@EU_Commission #Maroc et #Unioneuropéenne ont conclu mercredi 24 juillet 2013 1 nouvel accord de pêche, après six rounds de pourparlers #EU
@EU_Commission   le #parlementeuropéen soutient lé réformes engagée par le gouvernement Marocain #europeanunion #europe #saharaoccidental
@EU_Commission safety for all is #ecigs free #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @Clive_Bates Given comparative safety to cigarettes, ensuring *access* for all should be the driver. Stop #euecigban
@EU_Commission It's simple: e-cig is not tobacco! Tobacco kills, e-cig saves! #EuecigBan #ecigs #EFVI #Aiduce #EU #VapInLiberty
.@EU_Commission Your Article 18 #TPD amendments on #ecigs are unlawful, unreasonable & will #kill millions of people. Go to hell. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission you're making Europe safe for cigarettes. It's a double negative: tough on #ecigs & harm reduction = easy on cigs & harm.
Eh? @EU_Commission you're making Europe safe for cigarettes. It's a double negative: tough on #ecigs & harm reduction = easy on cigs & harm.
@EU_Commission @Hifistud Your electorate have already voted against these proposals. Why are you undermining democratic process ?
@EU_Commission mais bien sur ont va vous croire ! l'UE veut détruire la ecig pour se gaver des bénéfices du tabac !!!!!
@EU_Commission @ClopidoBrasil Art 18 = mort annoncée de l' #ecigs & mort annoncée de millions d'européens ! e-cig save life ! #EuecigBan #EU
@EU_Commission whatever the priority is, we do not need your "safety" which will kill us. #euecigban #ecigs
@EU_Commission @Hifistud If anything other than AM170 agreed it'll be a travesty for all. Remove #ecigs from TPD and engage users properly.
@EU_Commission negociation With Who ? Philip Morris ? #EUecigBAN #ecigs
@EU_Commission Safety for all means not encouraging vapers back to tobacco
@EU_Commission @Hifistud Look at ALL the evidence, it's the only way to make an informed decision
@EU_Commission  Safety for all ?...ban Tobacco
@EU_Commission @Hifistud safety for all is #ecigs free
@EU_Commission @Hifistud so why don't you work with local governments to enforce existing regulations rather than proposing a ban?
@EU_Commission @goldenvaper Nice to see the commission acknowledging the term "ban" I guess even they can't pretend otherwise at this stage!
@EU_Commission c'est quand même fou de vouloir bannir exactement tout ce que les #vapers plébiscitent ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission expects higher card acceptance by retailers to offset reduced card issuer revenue. #EuroPayReg
@EU_Commission P. Mairesse, #erasmusplusfr c'est une bonne nouvelle dans un contexte difficile
@EU_Commission These Twittbombs are just the start. We are getting organised, and by the time the bans kick in, there will be 5x the number.
@EU_Commission only #ecigs that can't be used or operated by children to be placed on the market, are cigarette packets really child proof?
@EU_Commission First it was Snus now its e cigs,stop the killing,start thinking about health  #EUecigBAN #ecigs
@EU_Commission cigarettes get plain packaging and carry on as normal e cigs regulated out of existance why ? #EUecigban #ecigs
@EU_Commission Everyone knows its about money not health,you lie break your own rules and ignore votes #ammendment170 #ecig #ukecigban
@EU_Commission e cigs kids cant operate,you want NRT as the only thing on the market #corruption  #ecig #euecigban
@EU_Commission We're watching You in the trialogue. No #EUecigban!
@EU_Commission Ihr glaubt, wir ziehen den Maulkorb freiwillig an? #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Ist der #EU eigentlich das Wohl ihrer Bürger völlig egal? Geht´s nur noch um Geld und Macht? Widerlich! #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission  Save your jobs- save our lives #saveecigs from the #eueccigban MILLIONS MORE SMOKERS NEED A CHOICE! I have made mine! #ecigs
@eu_commission @LindaMcAvanMEP @borgton Nothing about us, without us. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission The #EUecigban is a bad idea. Do you really want to be known as killers?
@EU_Commission No #EUecigBaN for #ecigs Vaporizing instead of smoking may save lives. Let consumers decide themselves, don't allow lobbyism
@EU_Commission Was ist euch unsere Gesundheit wert? Was haben BigT und BigP euch dafür gezahlt? #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Get the real facts about #ecgis - stop the #EUecigban
@EU_Commission sie kennen sich mit #ecigs gut genug aus? Was ist ein Taifun? Was King-Kong? Was ein Schubser? WISSEN Sie DAS?
@EU_Commission Wie soll man in diese #EU Vertrauen haben! Schämt Euch! #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission EU-Fanatiker gebt endlich Ruhe - Wir sind auch Wähler!!! #ecigs   #EUecigBAN #eu
@EU_Commission These Twittbombs are just the start. We are getting organised, and by the time the bans kick in, there will be 5x the number.
@EU_Commission Wer gegen Meinungsfreiheit und Informationsrecht ist, gehört hart bestraft, allen Ämtern enthoben! #ecigs #euecigban
@EU_Commission AM 170 already is a compromise. Anything more is #EUecigban
@EU_Commission banning ecigs while you leave big tobacco to sell certified lethal products that raise tax billions ? Hitler would approve
@EU_Commission We vapers fight against the #EUecigban
@EU_Commission: Do you really want to prevent scientists from publishing positive results about #ecigs? They may promote sales. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs less harmful than tobacco cigarettes WHY #EU determined to impose #EUEcigBAN ? MONEY NOT HEALTH!
@EU_Commission Stop supporting BigT / BigP, start supporting the european voters. #EUecigBan is a historic fail! Save #ecigs
@EU_Commission Wann schreibt ihr endlich die Sponsoren unter eure Vorschläge? #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Wir wollen nicht von Regulierungsfanatikern erzogen werden - den #ecigs gehört die Zukunft, stoppt den #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission I will not accept the #EUecigBan! I WILL NOT OBEY! #ecigs saving lives!
@eu_commission if you enforce tobacco's dominance of nicotine market & the government's tax revenue with an ecig ban who are you helping ?
@EU_Commission U worry for children? Worry for every child whose parent is a smoker while u remove what may be their only chance #ecigs #eu
@EU_Commission : You're putting money before lives, how insane is that, it's not too late for you to save our Ecigs #EUecigBAN #ecigs
@EU_Commission None of us know what's happening behind your closed doors. But we will find out, and this story will be exposed #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Von 35 auf 2 Zig./Tag innerhalb von 3 Wochen dank #ecigs Keine belegte Zunge, keine Kurzatmigkeit mehr. Nein zu #EUEcigBan
@EU_Commission Do not let this be your legacy. The continued deaths of millions of smokers for generations to come! #ecigs #euecigban #eu
@EU_Commission Do not let this be your legacy. The continued deaths of millions of smokers for generations to come! #ecigs #euecigban #eu
@EU_Commission Ihr wollt mich rauchend, stinkend und krank? Ihr könnt ... *Zitat Götz v. B.*! #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission No legislation without representation. Nothing about us without us NO #EUecigBAN noow… or EVER!
@EU_Commission Das #EUParlament hat am 8.10.13 eindeutig gegen eine medizinische Regulierung von #Ecigs gestimmt! #EUecigBAN #EU #edampfen
@EU_Commission Life without liberty is like a body without spirit,Biafrans need our nation restored #indigenouspeopleofBiafra Support Us.
@EU_Commission #EU is taking lives while taking money! SHAME! Save #ecigs, stop #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission Meine Gesundheit ist nicht euer Spielball.
Ich lasse mir die #ecigs nicht nehmen. #EU #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission EU Parl voted against med regs and #euecigban. Democracy says #ecigs should not be over regulated
@EU_Commission Meine #ecig ist kein Arznei oder Tabakprodukt, meine Dampfe ist ein Genussmittel. Stoppt den #EUecigBAN #ecigs
@EU_Commission Macht endlich Euren Job im Sinne Eurer wirklichen Auftraggeber... nein,   BigT und BigP sind es eigentlich nicht! #ecigs
@EU_Commission Wir wollen nicht von Regulierungsfanatikern erzogen werden - den #ecigs gehört die Zukunft, stoppt den #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs are neither tobacco or medicines. #EUEcigBan is undemocratic, inhumane, and with no legal basis.
@EU_Commission: Make a change!Save the users of #ecigs from tobbaco- &pharmaslavery. Cancel defacto #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Wir wollen nicht von Regulierungsfanatikern erzogen werden - den   #ecigs gehört die Zukunft, stoppt den #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission wollen Sie verantwortlich sein, wenn #ecigs so stark eingeschränkt werden, dass die #EU_Dampfer wieder rauchen müssen?
@EU_Commission Tomorrow 7,000,000 of #EU vapors Will be watching you carefully #EUecigBAN #ecigs save lives
@EU_Commission don't allow money to guide your common sense, oppose #EUecigBAN NOW!
@EU_Commission Lasst die Hände von den #ecigs Der #EUecigBAN ist ein schlechter Witz
@EU_Commission #ecigs are neither tobacco or medicines. #EUEcigBan is undemocratic, inhumane, and with no legal basis.
@EU_Commission Ihr wollt den Dampfer-Schwarzmakt, ihr bekommt den Dampfer-Schwarzmarkt. Macht nur so weiter! #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Wenn Ihr es mit den Kindern ernst meint, dann sollte der #EUecigBAN sofort vom Tisch und die #ecigs unterstützt werden.
@EU_Commission Reguliert gefälligst die Lobbyisten, nicht das Dampfen! #ecigs #EUecigBAN
